channel.title: POCO F7 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: POCO F7 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.2.0.VOKTRXM Fastboot update for POCO F7 Pro Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F7 Pro Turkey

Codename: zorn

Version: OS2.0.2.0.VOKTRXM | 15.0

Size: 8.3 GB

MD5: 99936997eecb7d6426a2b34a665d4157

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to January 2025. Increased system security.
[Alive Design Philosophy]
Alive Design Philosophy unveils fresh, vibrant design across the whole system, making every interaction feel smooth and alive.
All-new Artistic Lock screen:
Artistic Lock screen brings new templates and effects inspired by classic designs, giving your device a cinematic look every time you unlock it.
All-new Gallery:
With AI and reorganized collections, Gallery makes your memories even more vivid.
All-new Weather
Real-time Weather Engine 2.0 shows you the sky and clouds just like in real life – even lets you see rainbows and the Milky Way.
All-new Calendar:
The new Desktop calendar adds a touch of ritual to your day.
All-new Clock:
Updated Clock uses a more refined display structure for a more elegant, easy-to-read look.
Updated animations:
A full-scale animation upgrade makes every interaction flow smoothly and feel stable, responsive, and comfortable.
[Xiaomi HyperCore]
Xiaomi HyperCore, Xiaomi's proprietary core technology platform, enhances performance, graphics, network, and security.
New dynamic memory:
New technology allows precise resource allocation, so apps start up faster.
Upgraded rendering:
Upgraded rendering for multitasking extends battery life.
Heterogeneous computing:
Enhanced rendering pipeline boosts hardware performance for faster, more efficient visuals.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.201.0.VOKMIXM Fastboot update for POCO F7 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F7 Pro Global

Codename: zorn

Version: OS2.0.201.0.VOKMIXM | 15.0

Size: 9.4 GB

MD5: a0e369539e3de3a1e82e95ee7d235e5d

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation when closing apps in Landscape mode
[System]
Optimization: Immersive effect for full screen indicator in certain scenarios
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: Animation effects when launching apps
Optimization: Scrolling performance on content feeds in some third party apps
Optimization: Stability of animations when opening and closing apps
Fix: Wallpapers disappeared in rare cases when opening or closing apps
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps
Fix: Issues with animations when opening or closing apps
Updated the security patch to June 2025. Increased system security.
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[Lock screen]
New: Eastern aesthetics lock screen templates
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Some status bar icons now support custom display
[Accessibility]
Fix: Touch gestures stopped working in TalkBack mode
Fix: Volume buttons didn't work in TalkBack mode
Fix: Issues that prevented Recorder from capturing TalkBack audio
Fix: Issues with announcements for unselected items in Calendar and other apps
Fix: Some buttons weren't announced in several apps, including Settings, Control center, Messaging, Contacts, Weather, Notes, and Browser

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.12.0.VOKCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K80 China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K80 China

Codename: zorn

Version: OS2.0.12.0.VOKCNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 44c050c43ea6253b3e26c879894a6ee6

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
Optimization: Improved smoothness and reduced lag in Game for Peace
[Basic improvements]
Optimization: Optimized the hot zone for full screen gestures for instant response
Optimization: Stability issues such as Douyin crashes and short video playback errors
Fix: Home screen or Lock screen turned black when the wallpaper process was terminated
Fix: Screen flickered when re-entering certain games from Recents
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
[Control center]
Fix: Occasional overlapping of Notification shade and the Control center
[Settings]
Optimization: Battery health display

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
